fields.name: XP
fields.description:
The Acu XP micro is perfect for those who are serious about relief, but beginners with the technology. It offers the main therapies and just a few extras and still has a dual output for larger or multiple treatment areas.

Included in this package:
– AcuXP Micro device
– 1 set of large single-sided adhesive electrode pads 2 ½ inches (round shape)
– 1 set of small single-sided adhesive electrode pads 1 ¾ inch (small oval shape)
– 2 Electrode Wires
– AC/DC Adapter (travel charger)
– USB Cable
– User Manual

fields.name: XPD12
fields.description:
The new and improved XPD12 is a powerhouse when it comes to value. 6 pain relief (TENS) and 6 muscle enhancement (EMS) functions make it one of the most popular units in the HiDow lineup.

Features:
– 12 modes (6 TENS, 6 EMS)
– 2 output channels (same modality used on both, differing intensity per output)
– adjustable timer
– backlit LCD display
– built-in rechargeable lithium battery
– 2-year warranty

fields.name: XPDS18
fields.description:
HiDow’s latest and most advanced model of wired devices for muscle recovery and pain relief, the XPDS 18. Take your EMS experience to the next level with 6 new modes and functions.

Features:

18 pre-set multi-stim modes (TENS and EMS)
dual port (A and B)
independent control per port: intensity and modality
self-timer: 10-60 minutes
20 intensity levels
long-lasting rechargeable lithium battery: 10+ hours of use
compact, lightweight, and portable

fields.name: Wireless
fields.description:
Introducing HiDow’s newest multi-stim model, the Pro Touch Wireless 6-12 is a premium electronic muscle stimulator without the hassle of wires.

Now you can experience Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation (TENS) and Electrical Muscle Stimulation (EMS) on the go, during any exercise or workout, all in the comfort of your own space while wearing any clothing comfortably overtop.

Features:

Touchscreen remote (our 12 most popular TENS and EMS modes)
6 Wireless Receivers Capacity (2 included in your original package)
Strategically designed with state-of-the-art medical grade and fitness technology, the Pro Touch Wireless 6-12 moves with your body while still stimulating muscle impulses and targeting nerve receptors.

Included in this package:
1 x Pro Touch Wireless remote
2 x Wireless receivers (#1 and #2)
1 x lower back electrode gel pad
1 x set of L & 1 x set XL electrode gel pads
1 x Dual AC Adapter
2 x USB charging cables
1 x set of ear clips
2 x 8″ Wires
1 x User Manual
1 x Warranty registration card

fields.name: Acubelt
fields.description:
The belt-style cutaneous garment electrodes are intended to be used with all HiDow electrical stimulating devices. The package includes 2 straps of different lengths that allow you to place the belt-style garment electrodes on various areas. It may be used on the lower back area with the longer strap and legs and arms using the shorter strap. The straps may also be connected to extend the length of the strap if needed.

The belt-style cutaneous garment electrodes will deliver the stimulation signals generated by the HiDow stimulator to the body surface with which they are in contact. The garment electrodes are made up of conductive silicone rubber.

Compatible with all HiDow devices, the Acu Belt allows users to place electrodes on hard-to-reach areas without others’ support. It is designed to fit most users.

Included in this package:
1 AcuBelt
2 Velcro Straps: Small (11.5-inch length), Large (2 ft. 11-inch length)
1 sample size 5 ml of our Perfect Ion Conductor Spray

fields.name: Slippers
fields.description:
The Foot Accessory cutaneous electrodes are intended to be used with all HiDow electrical stimulating devices.

The cutaneous Foot Accessory electrodes will deliver the stimulation signals generated by the HiDow stimulator to the bottom of the feet with which they are in contact.

One size fits most, not made for walking. Please enjoy while seated.

fields.name: Acuelbow
fields.description:
The elbow-style cutaneous garment electrodes are intended to be used with all HiDow electrical stimulating devices.

The elbow-style cutaneous garment electrodes will deliver the stimulation signals generated by the stimulator to the body surface with which they are in contact. The garment electrodes are made up of conductive silicone rubber.

Universal – Works with all HiDow Devices.

fields.name: Acugloves
fields.description:
The HiDow Glove style accessories are cutaneous electrodes intended to be used with HiDow TENS/EMS stimulating devices.

The glove accessory electrodes are non-sterile reusable OTC conductive garments that are intended to deliver the stimulation signals generated by the stimulator to the hands.

It is intended for adult use.

These one-size fits most gloves are light-weight, comfortable, and have unique stretchable material.

fields.name: Acusocks
fields.description:
The HiDow Sock style accessories are cutaneous electrodes intended to be used with HiDow TENS/EMS stimulating devices.

The Sock accessory electrodes are non-sterile reusable OTC conductive garments intended to deliver the stimulation signals generated by the stimulator to the feet.

Adult use only.

Universal. They will work with any HiDow device: wired or wireless.

fields.name: Acuwrist
fields.description:
The wrist-style cutaneous garment electrodes are intended to be used with all HiDow electrical stimulating devices.

The wrist-style cutaneous garment electrodes will deliver the stimulation signals generated by the stimulator to the body surface with which they are in contact. The garment electrodes are made up of conductive silicone rubber.

Universal – Works with all HiDow Devices.

fields.name: Acuneck
fields.description:
The neck style cutaneous garment electrodes are intended to be used with HiDow electrical stimulating devices.

The neck style cutaneous garment electrodes will deliver the stimulation signals generated by the stimulator to the body surface with which they are in contact. The garment electrodes are made up of conductive silicone rubber.

fields.name: Acushoulder
fields.description:
The shoulder style cutaneous garment electrodes are intended to be used with all HiDow electrical stimulating devices.

The shoulder style cutaneous garment electrodes will deliver the stimulation signals generated by the stimulator to the body surface with which they are in contact. The garment electrodes are made up of conductive silicone rubber.

Package Includes:

1 Shoulder Wrap | 1 Conductor Spray | 1 Information Card for Conductor Spray

fields.name: Akuknee
fields.description:
The knee style cutaneous garment electrodes are intended to be used with all HiDow electrical stimulating devices.

The knee style cutaneous garment electrodes will deliver the stimulation signals generated by the stimulator to the body surface with which they are in contact. The garment electrodes are made up of conductive silicone rubber.

Package Includes:

1 Knee Wrap | 1 Conductor Spray | 1 Information Card for Conductor Spray

fields.name: Perfect Spray
fields.description:
The Perfect Conductor Spray helps to extend the life of your pads and provides a boosted ion-enhanced sensation. Works great with all our premium accessories as well!

The 100 ml/ 3.4 oz bottle contains no grease or oils and is water-based with ion conductivity used by professionals.

Try it with the AcuBelt, Pro Belt, and the AcuSlippers. It is also indispensable for all HiDow wraps: neck wrap, elbow wrap, wrist wrap, shoulder wrap, knee and foot wraps.

fields.name: Jumbo Pads
fields.description:
This pad is excellent for fighting lower back pain! Also, it fits perfectly on larger muscle groups, like arms and legs.

Areas of application:

lower back
biceps
quads
above the knee (for the most coverage)

fields.name: XL pads
fields.description:
The HiDow Extra Large Pads are ideal for an all-purpose massage. Get the most out of your personal therapy session.

Suitable for use with all HiDow devices.

Dimensions:

Two 3 ½” x 1 ¾” Pads

fields.name: Large Pads
fields.description:
The HiDow Large Pads are ideal for all-purpose massage.

Suitable for use with all HiDow devices.

Dimensions:

Two 2.4″ x 2.4″ Pads

fields.name: Mix Pack of Pads
fields.description:
We understand it is important to change out your pads for efficiency and sanitation, that is why Hidow has created a set of 2 or 3 of 5 mixed sized electrode pads packs at one great price. For your convenience, buy and bulk and save. Get the most out of your device by targeting the areas that need it the most.

Universal  – Suitable for use with all HiDow devices.

Extend the life of your pads with the Perfect Conductor Spray to increase its longevity and to enhance the sensations for every use. Our water-based formula means no oils or residue left on top of the skin. To use, lightly spray the Perfect Conductor on an electrode or body wrap and enjoy the solution to pain management.

Dimensions:

Large Electrode Pads: circular 2.4” diameter (come as a pair)

Extra Large Electrode Pads: rectangular 3 ½” x 1 ¾” (come as a pair)

Lower Back Electrode Pad: rounded rectangle 8 ¾” x 3 ½” (comes as single)

PACKS:

2 of each size – Total 6
3 of each size – Total 9
5 of each size – Total 15

fields.name: Lifetime Warranty Card
fields.description:
All genuine HiDow TENS and EMS units come with a 2-year warranty that covers manufacturer defects.

For $49.00 you can upgrade to a worry-free, Lifetime Warranty that will cover your device for any manufacturer defects.
This VIP membership entitles the bearer to the following benefits:
-Lifetime warranty service for your HiDow device*
-Exclusive email offers and promotions
-20% off all orders at www.hidow.com

*covered: battery, channel ports, buttons, and device integrity under normal use.

*accidental damage, such as screen damage, charging port damage, and water damage are considered out of terms.

*we will replace your device with the same model you originally purchased.

*parts of consumable nature, such as pads, wires, and cables are not covered under the warranty.

* nominal processing fee may apply to all warranty claims.
